name: European tourism association
membership:
ETOA is a constituent member of NET, a network for European private sector tourism associations. See www.net-tourism.eu
We are represented in the steering group for the Tourism Manifesto for Jobs and Growth. See: http://www.tourismmanifesto.eu
goal:
ETOA is a trade association for tour operators and suppliers with business in European destinations. Over 800 members contribute more than â‚¬12bn of business within Europe and include tour and online operators, intermediaries and wholesalers; European tourist boards, hotels, attractions and other tourism suppliers.

Our vision is to be the most influential driver for growth in European tourism and a trusted resource for policy makers and businesses.

Our mission is to champion European tourism at EU, national and regional levels; provide valuable services and expertise to our members and partners; design and deliver market-leading trade events and seminars.

We seek to act in the long term interests of European visitor economy such that destinations remain appealing places to live and visit and do business in, and thus remain a sustainable source of employment for the foreseeable future.
